layer_1_pure_logic.methodology: In-memory decision logic with pre-loaded rules via benchmark_pure_logic.sh

layer_2_infrastructure_comparison.claim: Constitutional queries use same infrastructure as RAG

layer_3_end_to_end.claim: Complete system demonstrates practical feasibility on consumer hardware

honest_performance_summary.pure_logic_overhead_claim: Constitutional decision logic adds 0.000170ms (170 nanoseconds) measured via systematic benchmarking
honest_performance_summary.infrastructure_overhead_claim: Constitutional queries reuse existing RAG infrastructure with 2.37% delta (negligible)
honest_performance_summary.end_to_end_claim: Complete validation achieves ~3.8 second performance on consumer hardware
honest_performance_summary.breakdown_claim: 94%+ of latency is database I/O shared with baseline RAG systems
